input: This product is an add-on to existing furniture, specifically a shelf. It requires no assembly, has an eco-friendly construction and will attach securely to any furniture.
output: The product's eco-friendly construction and lack of assembly are positive characteristics. It could also benefit from a more universal design so it could attach to a wider range of furniture pieces. Additionally, the product could include adjustability features such as being able to move along the shelf in order to accommodate various shelf sizes or changing the angle of attachment.
